Summary: Light seemed to be below 10k feet in alitude, moved from horizon to horizon in aprox 10secs, no streaks or trail emitted from the object
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving over the Mt.Hope bridge just south of Roger Williams University. My passenger and I were engaged in casual conversation as we drove north over the bridge. out of nowhere we fell silent as we noticed and extremely fast moving bright light moved from horizon to horizon. We both remarked at the same time "That there was no way that was a plane". The experience left us uneasy and silent for the rest of the trip back to the hotel.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bristol
This sighting has never been favorited.
